[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@handtracking.io/yoha](./yoha.md) &gt; [ITrackResult](./yoha.itrackresult.md)

## ITrackResult interface

Hand tracking results.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ITrackResult 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [coordinates](./yoha.itrackresult.coordinates.md) | number\[\]\[\] | Array of 21 \[x, y\] coordinates where x and y are relative coordinates such that \[x,y\] = \[0,0\] corresponds to the top left pixel of the track source and \[x,y\] = \[1,1\] corresponds to the bottom right pixel of the track source.<!-- -->The array is orderd as follows: <ul> <li> <code>[0-3]</code>: Thumb from base to tip.<br> </li> <li> <code>[4-7]</code>: Index finger from base to tip.<br> </li> <li> <code>[8-11]</code>: Middle finger from base to tip.<br> </li> <li> <code>[12-15]</code>: Ring finger from base to tip.<br> </li> <li> <code>[16-19]</code>: Little finger from base to tip.<br> </li> <li> <code>[20]</code>: Base of hand.<br> </li> </ul> |
|  [isHandPresentProb](./yoha.itrackresult.ishandpresentprob.md) | number | The probability that the analyzed frame contains a hand. |
|  [isLeftHandProb](./yoha.itrackresult.islefthandprob.md) | number | The probability that the detected hand (if any) is a left hand. Note that this is with respect to the processed video which may or may not be flipped depending on how you retrieved it. |
|  [poses](./yoha.itrackresult.poses.md) | [IPoseProbabilities](./yoha.iposeprobabilities.md) | The detected hand poses. |
